entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
